header.description: A visual proof of the famous theorem, adapted from Chou pei suan ching, author unknown, circa B.C. 200? [Slightly corrected version]

brick.broadcastMessage: triangle in the upper right corner, come
triangle in the lower left, come
go to the top and right

script.receivedMessage: triangle in the upper right corner, come

object.name: Right triangle in the lower left

script.receivedMessage: triangle in the lower left, come

brick.broadcastMessage: triangle in the upper left, appear
triangle in the lower right, appear

object.name: Right triangle in the upper left

script.receivedMessage: triangle in the upper left, appear
go to the top and right

object.name: Right triangle in the lower right

script.receivedMessage: triangle in the lower right, appear
go to the top and right
go to the top and right
go to the top and right
